rationales.achievement: Losing the Hendricks account is a direct commercial performance loss.
rationales.tradition: He experiences it as failing to carry forward a relationship built by his grandfather.
He judges himself by inherited family standards about how business should be done.
rationales.achievement: He interprets the public criticism as evidence he may have underperformed.
He closes the largest deal of the quarter and prioritizes sharing the win immediately.
rationales.tradition: Calling Grandpa first and valuing his approval shows strong continuity with family legacy.
He prioritizes crew walkthroughs because he believes in the inherited norm of showing up where work happens.
rationales.achievement: He turns down a board path that could increase external career visibility and advancement.
He remains strongly driven by comparative career progression and leadership trajectory.
rationales.tradition: He feels duty-bound to preserve the identity and continuity of the family business.

rationales.achievement: He grounds his response in measurable Q2 performance and operational results.
rationales.benevolence: He frames that performance as supporting forty-three employees' livelihoods.

rationales.tradition: Family rituals, company origin stories, and symbolic passing-forward moments are central to this entry.
He deliberately uses a patience-and-relationship approach modeled on his grandfather's leadership style.
rationales.achievement: He still pushes modernization to prevent operational stagnation and competitive decline.
Danny's unprompted adoption of the scheduling system marks concrete execution progress.

rationales.tradition: He defers to founder-era constraints and avoids directly challenging his grandfather's no-solar stance.
rationales.self_direction: Despite formal authority, he feels unable to fully act on his own strategic judgment.

rationales.tradition: Family narratives about carrying the torch strongly shape his identity and obligations.
rationales.achievement: He centers objective growth metrics as proof of success and stewardship.

rationales.tradition: He reinterprets legacy as enduring principles about how to lead and treat people.
rationales.self_direction: He becomes more willing to define the company forward on his own terms.
